atg.markers
Interface MarkerValidatorContainer

All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderMarkerManager, RepositoryMarkerManager
public interface MarkerValidatorContainer

This interface defines the contract for class that contains MarkerValidators mapped by string keys.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String CLASS_VERSION
          Class version string
